title: Founded
description: The Dayville Volunteer Fire Company was founded by **Byron F. Barrowclough** as a ‘one-man’ fire department.

title: Incorporated
description: The Dayville Volunteer Fire Company was incorporated into a three-company operation, with **D. Russell Watt** as Chief.

title: District
description: The Dayville Fire District was created as a special taxing district.

title: New Station
description: A new, larger station was built facing Hartford Pike.

title: Training Center
description: The [Lt. Dennis R Lemery Memorial Training Center](/training-center/) opens, offering fire training services for the fire companies in Killingly and the surrounding areas.

title: Regional Teams
description: Regional drone, technical rescue, and rehabiltiation teams are formed to assist mutual aid partners.
